mapper.select: select p.permissions_id permissionsId from sys_role r inner join sys_role_permissions rp on rp.role_id = r.role_id inner join sys_permissions p on p.permissions_id = rp.permissions_id where r.role_id = #{roleId} order by p.sort asc

select group_concat(r.role_name separator ";") roleListStr from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.user_id inner join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where u.user_id = #{userId} group by u.user_id

select r.role_id, r.role_name, r.sort from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.user_id inner join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where u.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by r.sort asc
